title: foxyshiba
author: foxyshiba
content: Foxy Shiba on DeFi innovation that creates benefits and value for $FShiba token holdersIntroductory of New Token Foxy Shiba Preparing for the Launch $FShibaDeFi innovation that creates benefits and value for $FShiba token holders and the Foxy Shiba is a new financial protocol that makes more efficient and awards $FSHIBA tokens in crypto.Inspired by the largest memecoin by market cap, Foxy Shiba is a crypto token that is a native of the Binance Smart Chain that has unique fee structures to benefit holders.would you like to attend a space journey with your favorite crypto?The Foxy Shiba Token team will develop special games for Holders and Crypto Enthusiasts who want to make money by playing. Get crypto and NFT rewards by playing crypto games.You’ve probably heard of BNB Chainthe home of the BNB currency. It’s optimized for ultra-fast trading.To achieve this, it had to make certain trade-offs – one being that it wasn’t as flexible from a programmability standpoint as other blockchains.BNB Smart Chain is here to change thata new blockchain with a full-fledged environment for developing high-performance decentralized applications. It was built for cross-chain compatibility to ensure that users get the best of both worlds.LinksWebsite : https://foxyshiba.netTelegram : https://t.me/foxyshibWhitepaper : https://foxyshiba.gitbook.io/foxy-shiba/RoadmapCheck List for our roadmapPhase 1Social Media and Community IntegrationSmart Contract CreationWebsite DeploymentWhitepaper PublishSEOTwitter RaidsPhase 2 - CURRENTMarketing CampaignForeign Communities Integration and CreationLaunch Marketing CampaignMajor Listings sitesCMS PostAirdrop CampaignShilling ContestPhase 3PancakeSwap LaunchingPR Famous SitesHuge Influencers CallsMass Marketing On Social MediaCoinmarketCap ListingCoin Gecko ListingFeesIn order to improve the currency to be effective, we put FEES only on the sale in order to promote the long term of the project to provide liquidity and marketing feesNo fees on BuyingNo purchase tax, contributes to healthy trade.Structure of SellThe taxes are divided into two areas based on sell transaction: 3% Marketing Fee10% Fee is automatically added to LP .Foxy Shiba token is running on Binance Smart ChainThe developers of Foxy Shiba Have a lot of experience in the field, a DeFithat provides a decentralized financial asset which rewards users with a sustainable fixed interest model through use of its unique proprietary protocol.Buybacks and token BurnsOne of our features of Foxy Shiba is an team buy backs and burn tokenswhich prevents circulating supply getting out of hand and becoming unmanageable.Automatic Liquidity Pool (LP)A liquidity pool is a collection of digital assets accumulated to enable trading on a decentralized exchange (DEX). A DEX is an exchange that doesn't rely on a third party to hold users' funds. Instead, DEX users transact with each other directly.The Foxy Shiba token always stays in your wallet it doesn’t need to be put into the hands of a 3rd party or centralized authority. All you need to do is buy & hold as you in your own wallet so there’s no more complicated processes at all.Trade starting on 1st march!
